amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out the District of Columbia's health insurance individual mandate.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3402 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 179.

Amendment SA 3402 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5533, S5536) To prohibit the use of funds to carry out the District of Columbia's health insurance individual mandate.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3402 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 3399.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3402 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 44. Record Vote Number: 179.
